title: Grateful Dead Live at Springfield Civic Center on 1980-09-03
lineage: MAC > Nakamichi DR-2 > Edirol FA-66 > Wavelab > CD-Wave > TLH > FLAC 2448 Tagged
source: 2x Nakamichi CM300/CP4 shotguns > Nakamichi 550 > Maxell XLII 90's, mics on stand, set up in the arena riser center, end of floor facing the stage.
